name: Mechaniheart
description:
--IN BROWSER VERSION MIGHT BE LAGGY. FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE, PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION--
In the world of Aqua, peace has been resolved after all of humanity died off. In its stead, marine creatures evolved and became sentient, and developed sports based on the machines left by those before them. Mechaniheart, the most popular of these sports bar none, is much like a destruction rally, but for giant humanoid mechs. Do you have what it takes to get to the top?

Controls: WASD - move, swerve using A and D while dashing.

Left Click: shoot in the direction of your pointer.

Right Click: if you can dash or shoot, dash towards the direction of your pointer or teleport on the location of your pointer.
